title: kalyANI khalu
sahitya:
(rAgA:  kalyANi)   


kalyANI khalu.  rAgamAlikA. rUpaka tALA.
kalyANI khalu yat kathAtrijagatAm pApaughavidhvamsini
yallAvaNyamasOSa gOpa kamanI nEtraikasam
sArangam pada nakrabhItama gatim yO-apAlayatam satvaram
bAhuryasya ca shankarAbharaNajit pAyAtsa vaha kEshavaha
